delete.TITLE: Delete Client IPMI User?
delete.BODY: This will revoke client access to IPMI until another client IPMI user is created.

confirm.TITLE: Set Boot Device to PXE?
confirm.BODY: This will make the server boot from the network for {{ persist ? 'all future boots' : 'the next boot' }}.

confirm.TITLE: Set Boot Device to Disk?
confirm.BODY: This will make the server boot from its Hard Disk for {{ persist ? 'all future boots' : 'the next boot' }}.

confirm.TITLE: Set Boot Device to BIOS?
confirm.BODY: This will make the server boot into BIOS for {{ persist ? 'all future boots' : 'the next boot' }}.

confirm.TITLE: Set Power to Off?
confirm.BODY: This will perform a hard power off on the server, the same as if the power plug were pulled.

confirm.TITLE: Set Power to Cycle?
confirm.BODY: This will perform a soft power off on the server, then power it back on.

confirm.TITLE: Set Power to Off?
confirm.BODY: This will perform a soft power off on the server, the same as if the power off button were pressed once. The server may decide not to power off if there is a process that refuses to shut down.

switch.TITLE: Switch Controls
switch.NOT_ENABLED: This server is not ready for switch controls.
switch.NAME: Switch Name

confirm.TITLE: Set Port Power to Off?
confirm.BODY: This will turn off power for this server's switch port.
